post.summary:

- Company Code
- Customer Code
- Code
- Description
- Account Code Type
- Vendor Code

204.description: Import was successfully completed and all rows were imported without any errors

401.description: Azure authentication token has expired. User needs to login again.

500.description: Import failed due to an internal server error.

}

put.summary: This method enabled OBT application to extend session of logged in anonymous users. Session will only be extended if extension limit hasn't been reached.

parameters.name: anonymous
parameters.description: Anonymous object contains time zone as reported by browser

403.description: Extension was refused most likely because session extension limit has been reached.

post.summary: This method enables OBT application to login anonymous users as system user defined for their company. If client is not enabled for anonymous use then this method will return 403 Forbidden.

parameters.name: anonymous
parameters.description: Anonymous object contains time zone as reported by browser

200.description: Anonymouse user was logged in successfully

403.description: User could not be logged on. Is their company enabled for anonymous use?

parameters.description: The ID of the card to fetch.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context of the card (i.e. hotel, car).

get.summary: Gets cart for logged in user.

404.description: Not found. Logged in user has no cart.

post.summary: Creates a cart and associates it with the current logged is user

204.description: No Content. Cart was created and server has nothing to return.

400.description: Bad Request. Required fields were not supplied.

401.description: Unauthorised. Azure OAuth 2.0 token has expired.

409.description: Conflict. Logged in user already has a cart.

delete.summary: Deletes cart associated with the current logged in user

204.description: No content. Cart was successfully was deleted.

404.description: Not found. No cart associated with this user was found.

post.summary: Creates an empty cart and associates it with the current logged in user.

204.description: No Content. Cart was created and server has nothing to return.

409.description: Conflict. Logged in user already has a cart.

post.summary: Adds flights to the cart. Each flight item being added to cart MUST contain FlightSearchId

200.description: Ok. Flights were added and corresponding Flight Ids are returned.

400.description: Bad Request. Required fields were not supplied.

404.description: Not found. Either no cart for logged in user was found or no flight with FlightSearchId was found.

409.description: Conflict. Flight being added already exists in cart.

delete.summary: Deletes the flight from cart that has the specified {flightId}

204.description: No content. Flight was successfully deleted.

404.description: Not found. Either cart was not found or no flight with {flightId} was found in the cart.

post.summary: Adds hotel to the cart. Each hotel being added to cart MUST contain HotelInfoId

parameters.name: hotel
parameters.description: Hotel to be added to cart

200.description: Ok. Hotels were added and corresponding Hotel Ids were returned.

400.description: Bad Request. Required fields were not supplied.

404.description: Not found. Either no cart for logged in user was found or no hotel with HotelInfoId was found.

409.description: Conflict. Hotel being added already exists in cart.

delete.summary: Removes hotel with {hotelId} from the cart

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Hotel to be removed from cart

204.description: No content. Flight was successfully deleted.

404.description: Not found. Either cart was not found or no hotel with {hotelId} was found in the cart.

post.summary: Add car to the hotel. CarAvailabilityId is a required field.

parameters.name: car
parameters.description: Car to be added to cart

200.description: Ok. Hotel was added and corresponding Car Id was returned.

400.description: Bad Request. Required fields were not supplied.

404.description: Not found. Either no cart for logged in user was found or no hotel with HotelInfoId was found.

409.description: Conflict. Car being added already exists in cart.

delete.summary: Removes car with {carId} from the cart.

parameters.name: carId
parameters.description: Car to be removed from cart

204.description: No content. Car was successfully deleted.

404.description: Not found. Either cart was not found or no car with {carId} was found in the cart.

post.summary:
Adds traveller to cart. Every field is a required field except:
- Phone
- Mobile

parameters.name: traveller
parameters.description: Person to be added to itinerary

200.description: Ok. Traveller was added and database Id was returned.

400.description: Bad Request. Required fields were not supplied.

401.description: Unauthorised. Azure OAuth 2.0 token has expired.

404.description: Not found. Cart for logged in user was not found.

409.description: Conflict. Traveller being added already exists in cart.

parameters.name: travellerId
parameters.description: Traveller to be removed from cart

204.description: No content. Car was successfully deleted.

404.description: Not found. Either cart was not found or no traveller with {travellerId} was found in the cart.

post.summary: Complete the booking with the submitted form of payment.

parameters.name: fop
parameters.description: The form of payment to complete the booking with.
